Question: EKMATRA TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ekmatra Technology Pvt Ltd

Corporate Gifting Platform

- Offers a wide range of corporate gifting categories including electronics, gift sets, drinkware, office stationary, grow kits, bags/luggage, apparels, and wellness products.
- Customization with corporate branding available.
- Focuses on nurturing relationships between organizations and their clients, prospects, and employees through carefully selected corporate gifts.
- Provides various types of corporate gifts including joining gifts, festival gifts, birthday gifts, work anniversary gifts, and rewards and recognition gifts.
- Aims to drive customer loyalty and employee satisfaction through smart gifting strategies.
